name: Pointer Drop
description:
Every time you click, you lose control of your mouse pointer! Use physics to your advantage to overcome each challenge. 

CONTROLS:

Use your mouse to move the pointer

Click to interact with objects

'R' to restart

Made in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2020. Despite having to restart after scrapping my original concept 5 hours in, I think this turned out pretty good! (Definitely better than if I'd stuck with my original idea.) Post your lowest number of retries in the comments, 6 is my record!
